summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 26, Denny=Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between 10th Avenue North and 11th Avenue North, from Shelby Street to Hamlin Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12949 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
